result.arabic_text: وَضَرَبَ لَنَا مَثَلٗا وَنَسِيَ خَلۡقَهُۥۖ قَالَ مَن يُحۡيِ ٱلۡعِظَٰمَ وَهِيَ رَمِيمٞ
result.translation: Araheza aducira agace kataroranye mu kugereranya ubushobozi bw’Imana Allah Yaremye, n’ubushobozi bw’ico Yaremye, maze yibagira intango y’iremwa ryiwe, arinamura ati: “Ni nde yosubiza ubuzima amagufa kandi yaramaze kubora akavungagurika!”
